name: AccountsByIndustryList
title: Accounts by Industry List
description: Sortable, paginated table component displaying filtered account records with row selection capability
functionalRequirements:
## Account List Component

- Display accounts in sortable table format
- Support column sorting with visual indicators
- Implement client-side pagination
- Enable row hover effects
- Handle row click for account selection
- Format currency values appropriately
- Show status badges with color coding
- Display clear filter button
technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- accounts: Filtered account array
- sortConfig: Current sort settings
- onSort: Sort handler callback
- onAccountClick: Row selection callback
- currentPage: Current pagination page
- pageSize: Items per page
- onPageChange: Pagination callback

### Features
- Client-side sorting logic
- Pagination calculation
- Hover state management
- Status badge styling

dataRequirements.description: Fetches account data using RunView for industry distribution analysis

entities.name: Accounts
entities.description: CRM account data grouped by industry
entities.usageContext: Groups accounts by industry for pie chart visualization and filtered list display

properties.name: accounts
properties.description: Array of account objects to display

properties.name: sortConfig
properties.description: Object with field and direction properties

properties.name: onSort
properties.description: Callback when column header is clicked for sorting

properties.name: onAccountClick
properties.description: Callback when account row is clicked

properties.name: onClearFilter
properties.description: Callback to clear the industry filter

exampleUsage:
<AccountsByIndustryList
  accounts={filteredAccounts}
  selectedIndustry={selectedIndustry}
  sortConfig={sortConfig}
  onSort={handleSort}
  onAccountClick={handleAccountClick}
  currentPage={currentPage}
  pageSize={pageSize}
  onPageChange={setCurrentPage}
  onClearFilter={handleClearFilter}
/>
